channel.title: When i wield some custom items my character dissapears. please help
channel.description: When i wield some custom items my character dissapears, but as soon as i wield a normal weapon i can see my char again

item.title: When i wield some custom items my character dissapears. please help

item.source: When i wield some custom items my character dissapears. please help

item.title: When i wield some custom items my character dissapears. please help
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

It is because, you edit each custom item to fit your character. Of course you do not match them up PERFECTLY. So, when you get multiple detailed items, such as, A cape with huge wings, a Bandos Kiteshield, a Gnome scarf, Full Dragon 'hai, ECT, you make the models just turn your char in to jfhdsakjfhkl. =p [ITHINK?]

Read full topic

item.description:
@samrofl wrote:

probably something to do with your “ints” or it could be that your (custom item is so big or highly modified) if that makes some sense) that your char is gone
